rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment does not contain high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlative negative nouns, or critical alert phrases.
The segment reports on workers developing conjunctivitis.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a negative fact (developed infections) without explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment reports symptoms in workers, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment reports the numerical metric 'Two of the workers' using standard verbs.
